::Astral/Recklessa::

Astral nods. "I'm fine. It takes more than some pile of metal to 
bring the Lavacons down!"

Personally, he wished that the other Lavacons had been there. He 
would have enjoyed forming Lavatron and chasing that bot away, or 
maybe killing him.

"Ok. I'll radio in for a shuttle. They'll send one for me and you. 
Recklessa, fly Griplash back to base."

Recklessa nods and takes off, swooping down to grab Griplash, and 
then flying off toward the Iron Fist, pushing her jetpack full blast. 
Astral taps several buttons on his comm-link, and several seconds 
later, a three-bot transport pod launches from the Iron Fist, heading 
for Astral and Composer.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> ::Composer::
> 
>       Composer was shaking for a moment, but stopped, when 
Motormaster left
> and Astral walked over.
> 
>        "Y...y...you okay?" He said shakily, from the shock of 
witnessing his
> very first battle.
> 
>           It could've been worse, he thought, he could've engaged 
in combat.
> But then again, he was destined to fight once in his life.
> 
>           "It's nice to meet you, I'm Composer," He paused for a 
moment,"Oh,
> how rude to leave you waiting for me to answer your question.  Yes, 
if you
> don't mind, I would like to go to the base."
